Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I am just looking around for any extra planet mods which work with KSP 1.0.5. I have found the Outer Planets mod already, and Planet Factory did not work.

Thanks! :D

Giacomo

Currently Kopernicus mod is the relevant extra-planets engine under active development.
[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114649-1-0-4-Kopernicus-Beta-%280-4%29-September-14[/url]

List of Kopernicus-based planet packs you can find on this page (see "Supported Planet Packs"):
[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128856-WIP-1-0-4-Galactic-Neighborhood-Integration-of-multiple-planet-packs-in-the-same-game[/url]

But currently this engine is not yet updated for 1.0.5, so you would await this.

My recommendations would be...

Conventional; Uncharted Lands - [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133416[/url]

Exotic; New Horizons - [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114092[/url]

But as Kerbiloid says, Kopernicus itself is not up to date for 1.0.5. It seems to mostly work, but there are particular issues with oceans, and possibly some FPS drops.

[quote name='eddiew']My recommendations would be...

Conventional; Uncharted Lands - [URL]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133416[/URL]

Exotic; New Horizons - [URL]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114092[/URL]

But as Kerbiloid says, Kopernicus itself is not up to date for 1.0.5. It seems to mostly work, but there are particular issues with oceans, and possibly some FPS drops.[/QUOTE]

Yes nice pick.
